
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18725095" title="发布于 2025-02-19 19:45">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">精选4款基于.NET开源、功能强大的通讯调试工具</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">前言</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">今天大姚给大家分享4款基于.NET开源、功能强大的通讯调试工具，旨在帮助.NET开发者们更好的应对通讯调试方面的学习和工作，提升调试效率。</p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">LLCOM</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">LLCOM是一个.NET开源的、功能强大的串口调试工具。支持Lua自动化处理、串口调试、串口监听、串口曲线、TCP测试、<span>MQTT测试、编码转换、乱码恢复等功能。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>项目开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/chenxuuu/llcom" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/chenxuuu/llcom</span></a></span></li>
<li>项目详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247497152&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=48301107e73a41ab9214c18b7889f2c3&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/bqJz8LjdnhpUR_6ynG0soQ</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194012247-276218695.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194019645-143787805.png" alt="" width="880" height="611" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194025914-1424713860.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Wu.CommTool</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Wu.CommTool是一款基于C#、WPF、Prism、MaterialDesign、HandyControl开发的通讯调试工具（支持Modbus RTU、MQTT调试，界面色彩丰富）。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>项目开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/Monika1313/Wu.CommTool" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/Monika1313/Wu.CommTool</span></a></span></li>
<li>项目详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247500558&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=663eebbd10ba09661ff111de8bd0209c&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/7nTJeZIyr3buTvYhI1w-ZQ</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194049874-742045343.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194054762-502244531.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194100622-637868242.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">BYSerial</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">BYSerial是一款基于 WPF 开源（MIT License）、免费、功能全面的串口调试工具，支持中英文双语切换，具有通用串口调试工具的一般功能，如<span>串口通讯调试、TCP通讯调试、支持串口接收数据曲线显示等。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>项目开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/LvYiWuHen/byserial" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/LvYiWuHen/byserial</span></a></span></li>
<li>项目详细介绍：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247509905&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=31dd11ca76b549ca5e191da34903b252&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/cAb5GExmhU0_6mw-M3iHRA</a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194115492-1614771991.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194122179-1970651754.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194149378-416939757.png" alt="" width="793" height="626" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">PLC-CommunTools</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">PLC-CommunTools是一款基于.NET WinForm开发的一款硬件及协议通讯工具，包含各类厂商的PLC协议及基础的TCP、串口通讯、IO口通讯等协议通讯功能的实现整合，注意还有一部分功能作者还在努力完善中。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>项目开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/SmallRob/PLC-CommunTools" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/SmallRob/PLC-CommunTools</span></a></span></li>
<li>项目详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247508560&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=56dc8f3eadc40a85b80aee1afe217e60&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/29gvIBLmFugemDUh_gNuVg</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194237786-1936565882.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194242528-463067420.png" alt="" width="911" height="553" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194249625-117294848.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">优秀项目和框架精选</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">以上项目都已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。坑已挖，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没🤞）。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>GitHub开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
<li>Gitee开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250219194304520-1344726987.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
</div>
